Vulois finaly awkoe from his deep meditation. He saw many things, 
which will help him along the way. But one thing he saw, made him 
burst into tears. He saw Soundwave's death about a mega-cycle before 
it was supposed to happen. The convix spoke to him while he was 
seeing this image.

"You can save him. This hasn't happened yet, but it will soon. You 
can go and save him, but if you do, than this information you are 
learning will be erased and you not be able to get it back again, and 
you will be unable to save Cybertron. This is to teach you that 
sacrifices must be made sometimes for the greater good. It isn't 
easy, and I don't like it, but it may soon be neccesary. So what do 
you choose?"

"Soundwave.......he was the first. When I first came here, when I was 
Vulois the evil Predacon, he was the first to come with me, and join 
my cause. Sure, it was different then, but he still trusted me. And 
now I have to let hime die?!? I can't......but I must. Cybertron is 
at stake, at Soundwave would want me to continue. I choose the 
information."

"I'm sorry, Vulois....."

Remembering this made Vulois feel the lowest low. By now Soundwave 
must be dead. Days have gone by. He only hopes that he won't have to 
do the same for Cybershark and Battera. Or for anyone else.....Wait a 
minute!

Vulois went to his feet. Maybe all is not lost! Child! The one he 
pormised to train! With his help is the only way Cybertron can be 
saved. And when he's up there on Cybertron, in front of The Matrix, 
he can retrieve Soundwave's spark! Salvation could still be at hand! 
He contacted HeraldAngle.

"Herald, this is Vulois, from the emissary. I am ready to train your 
son now. Bring him to me."

Vulois was about to ease up, when he saw something out the window: A 
bot(Windrazor), wanting to come in. He went out to him.

"What are you doing out here? Come in come in, and tell me why you 
are here."

(Can anyone can tell me if my other chars, Fliq and Bronco, made it 
back to The Ark with Ramulus? Thanx!)
